Ok...you need to
know three things
to complete Can It,
unlock a game,
and win a flip!

Stuff nobody wants.
Trash has little or no value
and can't be used
to make anything.

Anything that can be used
again or deconstructed to make
something new.

Organic matter
(which means it was once alive)
that has decayed and is used
as plant fertilizer.

Sort 10 to Win!
Double tap/click to release an item
from the dumpster into the
correct bin below.

ARE YOU SURE YOU
WANT TO QUIT?
